bodyContent1: Hi there! I'm a frontend developer who specializes in making templates and tools that are powerful while also being easy to use.
bodyContent2: This page is using data imported from 'pageAbout.json'.  You should use this pattern for handling any variable-powered page content.  This will allow you to edit this page from a more central location using plain text.  You're not limited to just adding content in this way - feel free to mix regular content and JSON content on your pages.  This is just here as an option to make things easier.
